item.title: West Town 3rd Floor Dorm
item.dc:creator: secure99
item.description: Beautiful 3rd floor P/House w/in a short walk/drive to restaurants, stores and public trans. Private room/bath featuring top amenities. HDTV, internet, biz center (in room), washer/dryer, wine fridge, gas fireplace, surround sound, private roof deck. One bus ride away from subway. Wifi, eat in kitchen, cable tshopsv, warm host family, and a small lovable dog. ...
item.content:encoded:
Beautiful 3rd floor P/House w/in a short walk/drive to restaurants, stores and public trans. Private room/bath featuring top amenities. HDTV, internet, biz center (in room), washer/dryer, wine fridge, gas fireplace, surround sound, private roof deck.

One bus ride away from subway. Wifi, eat in kitchen, cable tshopsv, warm host family, and a small lovable dog. Full breakfast included in price. Few stores at end of street, and minutes from Mattapan Square.

item.title: Victorian Bed & Breakfast
item.dc:creator: secure99
item.description: 3 rooms available in victorian home. One bus ride away from subway. Wifi, eat in kitchen, cable tshopsv, warm host family, and a small lovable dog. Full breakfast included in price. Few stores at end of street, and minutes from Mattapan Square. Attention! House is share host.
item.content:encoded: 3 rooms available in victorian home. One bus ride away from subway. Wifi, eat in kitchen, cable tshopsv, warm host family, and a small lovable dog. Full breakfast included in price. Few stores at end of street, and minutes from Mattapan Square. Attention! House is share host.

item.title: Beautiful Full Bed and Breakfast
item.dc:creator: secure99
item.description: 4 bedroom Victorian with an in law attic apartment. One bus ride away from subway. Wifi, eat in kitchen, cable tv, warm host family. And small loveable dog. Bathrooms are shared with host family. Full breakfast included in price.
item.content:encoded: 4 bedroom Victorian with an in law attic apartment. One bus ride away from subway. Wifi, eat in kitchen, cable tv, warm host family. And small loveable dog. Bathrooms are shared with host family. Full breakfast included in price.

item.title: Sunny Dorm in West Town Left Sidebar
item.dc:creator: secure99
item.description: Welcome to an original, atypical Paris stay on the river in front of the world’s most iconic landmark – sparkling at night! View from Montmartre (Sacré Coeur) to the Bir Hakeim Bridge – an amazing iron structure shown in many movies (Last Tango in Paris, Inception…). My beautiful and spacious second floor walk up offers ...
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to an original, atypical Paris stay on the river in front of the world’s most iconic landmark – sparkling at night! View from Montmartre (Sacré Coeur) to the Bir Hakeim Bridge – an amazing iron structure shown in many movies (Last Tango in Paris, Inception…).

My beautiful and spacious second floor walk up offers a private bedroom that comfortably fits two. Walking distance to the best eats on Randolph Street’s restaurant row, cta’s blue line, and West Town bars.

Many public transit :
*BatoBus : shuttle service on the river, pass for several days, main spots in Paris.
*bus 72 all along the Seine (direct for Concorde, Louvre, Hotel de Ville)
*metro Passy, 4 stations to Champs Elysées
*RER ligne C direct to Musée d’Orsay, Invalides, ND cathedrale, Quartier Latin…
